bibl.author: William Sloane Kennedy
bibl.title: William Sloane Kennedy to Walt Whitman, 26 January 1890
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839-1919, Library of Congress, Washington, DC.

body.p: Please tell Traubel that Hurd has looked hastily at the piece + pronounces it highly complimentary. But he was called away by the death of his mother, + will not be able to report more fully till his return.

We all have more or less of cold in the head + throat, but are otherwise well. Am going in to Athenaeum this afternoon to look up + read some of O'Connor's stories. My Whittier is in Funk + Wagnall's safe + is highly complimented by the editor of the series. So glad you are doing tolerably well. I'm off for eggs now.
